body: EVENTS WALL STREET COMMUNITY DAY FESTIVAL, from South Street to Water Street. Today, 11 a.m. to 6 p.m. Sponsored by Community Board No. 1. ''A TASTE OF CHELSEA,'' Chelsea Market, Ninth and Tenth Avenues, between 15th and 16th Streets, Manhattan. A sampling of foods from 20 restaurants and food shops, including the Lobster Place, Nick and Stef's
title: SPARE TIMES

body: AS the weather warms and days grow longer, curious people fan out to visit show houses and to tour private houses, apartments and gardens in search of design ideas and inspiration. Here are some of the events in the Northeast. Unless otherwise noted, tours are self-guided. New York FLATBUSH, BROOKLYN, APRIL 28: Ten houses in the Queen Anne,
title: The Tours of Spring, Beckoning Like Daffodils

body: WILLIAM and ADRIENNE LOVE wanted to sell their three-bedroom co-op in Coney Island and buy a house elsewhere in Brooklyn. He wanted parking; she likes to have a lot of bathrooms. They looked at dozens of houses, but there was just one that offered everything they wanted, or could ever want. There was only one problem. The owner didn't want to sell,
title: Habitats/Maple Street, Flatbush, Brooklyn; Couple's 5-Year Odyssey To Buy the Perfect Home
